meanings.sent1: I can speedread through a book in just a few hours.
meanings.sent2: She likes to speedread novels to finish them faster.
meanings.sent3: The detective had to speedread the case file before the suspect arrived.
meanings.sent4: His eyes seemed to speedread the words on the page, absorbing every detail.
meanings.sent5: With practice, you can learn to speedread and save time.

meanings.definition: The act of reading rapidly and with high comprehension.
meanings.sent1: Speedreading is a useful skill for students with busy schedules.
meanings.sent2: Her speedreading ability helped her ace the exam.
meanings.sent3: The speedreading competition was intense, with everyone trying to finish first.
meanings.sent4: His speedreading was like a superpower, allowing him to absorb information quickly.
meanings.sent5: The workshop taught techniques to improve speedreading skills.
